oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans souvenir reunion pin with ribbons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This reunion pin belonged to Pvt. Lewis Cole, Co. B, 55th Tenn. (Brown's) Inf., CSA. The brass pin is shaped as a shield and has two crossed Confederate flags with the dates 61-65 above the flags and 1906 below the flags. Cole was born in 1836 in Benton County, Tenn. and died in 1925 in Paris, Tenn.
